MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Kirkintilloch, affecting properties in Highfield Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.08am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we are awaiting generators arriving on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:41 PM on Wednesday, 23 December 2020
